articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: "Not The Way...": Ex-Pakistan Board Chief Slams Pak Minister's ODI World Cup Stance - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The former PCB chief cautioned that this was not the time to link Pakistan's participation in the 2023 ODI World Cup to the Asia Cup being held this year.
articles.content: The former chairman of the Pakistan Cricket Board, Khalid Mahmood has hit out at the government's decision to form a high-level committee to decide on the national cricket team's participation in the… [+1968 chars]

articles.title: How much protein do you need to build muscle; read THIS to know - Asianet Newsable
articles.description: Protein is abundant in our bodies, whether it's in our DNA, organs, enzymes, hormones, skin, or hair. As a result, it's no surprise that it's crucial in muscle development. But how much is the question here? Sports Nutritionist, Recipe curator and Integrative…
